Assessment.QuestionText: Can you write the code to create a text box control and masked text box control with names <font face="courier new">txtStudentName</font> and <font face="courier new">msktxtDate</font>, and the masked text box should accept date in mm/dd/yyyy format?
Assessment.CorrectAnswer:
TextBox txtStudentName = new TextBox();
MaskedTextBox msktxtDate = new MaskedTextBox();
msktxtDate.Mask = "00/00/0000";
this.Controls.Add(txtStudentName);
this.Controls.Add(msktxtDate);
Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Good! You have attempted this difficult question. You get a bonus point for your attempt. Click on View Answer for the answer.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: Good! You have attempted this difficult question. You get a bonus point for your attempt. Click on View Answer for the answer.
